name: TecnoShift Saudi Arabia
tag_list: iso-saudi-arabia, itil, pmp, six-sigma-saudi-arabia, bahrain, uae, iso-9001-saudi-arabia
overview:
TecnoShift is a Training and consulting company with great ambitions and visions. After its formation, TecnoShift is trying to become one of the fastest growing Training, Consultancy and IT services companies in Saudi Arabia, offering clients an array of related services.

We offer ITIL, PMP, PMO, Six Sigma, ISO 9001, ISO 27001 and other related areas trainings and soft skills and management courses.

Being a proudly Saudi Arabian company we want to play a fundamental role in advancing business solutions and knowledge transfer across our land and beyond its borders. Evolved from the Quality Management Systems and Services, Trainings, Coaching, IT Services, & ISO consulting & Trainings. Operating in Central Region with existing strategies to expand into Western and Eastern regions. We have onsite consultants, engineer and qualified trainers working in all the major regions of Saudi Arabia. By the grace of Allah, we have now expanded into Bahrain, UAE and other GCC countries as well. However, we are gradually moving towards growth.
